sense.def:
To think that something is the case
pomeni biti mnenja, da je nekaj res.

seg.quote: I think a woman has as much right to work as a man.
At first I thought he was asleep.
She thought of Deirdre simply as an old chum.
She's cleverer than I thought.

sense.def:
To think about something
pomeni v mislih nekaj pretresati.

seg.quote: That ought to make us think about how we can make a safer product.

sense.def:
To think of something or someone
pomeni spomniti se na nekaj ali nekoga.

seg.quote: I can never think of her name.
He can think of no reason for going.
...a method which had never been thought of before.

sense.def:
To think of someone
pomeni tudi biti obziren do nekoga.

seg.quote: It was very kind of you to think of him.
You never think about anybody but yourself!

sense.def:
To think a lot of someone or something
pomeni občudovati nekoga ali nekaj.

seg.quote: She thinks a lot of you.
I didn't think much of his letter.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
is thinking something
, na nekaj osredotoča pozornost.

seg.quote: I lay there thinking how funny it was.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
is thinking of doing something
, se ukvarja z mislijo, da bi nekaj naredil.

seg.quote: Is he still thinking of going away to Italy for a month?

sense.def:
Izraz
I think
dodamo svoji izjavi, da zveni manj močno ali nevljudno.

seg.quote: I think I ought to go.
I think that you will find my figures are correct.
Thank you, I don't think I will.

sense.def:
To think better of something
pomeni, da smo imeli namen nekaj narediti, potem pa sklenemo, da ne bomo.

seg.quote: She was on the point of waking Ben again, but then thought better of it.

sense.def:
To think nothing of doing something difficult or strange
pomeni, da smo pripravljeni narediti nekaj težavnega ali nenavadnega in da se nam to sploh ne zdi težko ali nenavadno.

cit.quote: ne biti nič takega, narediti za malo malico

seg.quote: We would think nothing of walking six miles just to post a letter.

sense.def:
To think back
pomeni spominjati se stvari, ki so se zgodile.

seg.quote: I'm thinking back to my own experience as a teacher.

sense.def:
To think something over
pomeni skrbno razmišljati o nečem, preden se odločimo.

seg.quote: I wanted to think over one or two business problems.

sense.def:
To think a problem or situation through
pomeni nekaj temeljito premisliti.

seg.quote: I haven't really thought the whole business through.

sense.def:
To think up something
pomeni ustvariti v svoji glavi nekaj domiselnega ali nenavadnega.

seg.quote: ...a new financial agreement he had thought up.
